parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of layers that are returned

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Specifies whether the layer is official. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: The name prefix of the layer.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: Specifies whether the layer is public. Valid values: true and false.
